title: World Traveler Ibn Battuta
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 788 words, Level P (Grade 2), Lexile 840L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and V
description: Many people have heard of Marco Polo, but far fewer people have heard of Ibn Battuta, the greatest traveler of the Middle Ages. In World Traveler Ibn Battuta, students will learn about the adventures and journeys of this remarkable man who traveled over 75,000 miles in his lifetime. The book can also be used to teach students how summarize text and to determine elements of a biography. The book and lesson are also available for levels S and V.
